channel.title: Data Engineering on
channel.description: Recent content in Data Engineering on

item.title: London Oyster Card - ER Model
item.description: Objective Record information: Basic user information: name, address Basic Oyster card information: card id, create date, card type, balance Trips: travel from, touch in date and time, travel to, touch out date and time, fare Dummy data The technique to produce ER model from the example data is called normalisation. The most popular choice is 3rd Normal Form. It is a 3 steps process, each step depends on the completion of the previous step and progressively transforming the data.
